title: Tony Fadell, Founder Of Nest Labs
teaser: Host Jessica Harris talks to Tony Fadell, founder of Nest Labs and former Apple developer. Harris also talks with Lyndon Rive, co-founder of SolarCity.
contentencoded:
Host Jessica Harris talks to Tony Fadell, founder of Nest Labs and former Apple developer. Harris also talks with Lyndon Rive, co-founder of SolarCity.
